title: Spiroll
author: Spiroll
created_time: December 16, 2022, 07:23:07 PMLast edit: December 17, 2022, 04:43:42 PM by Spiroll
content: You can check last campaign https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5424047.0About WithdrawCan I withdraw money right after depositingIf you never played on our site before then you wont be able to withdraw without playing on our site due to the Anti-Trade System. You can read more about it in the next point.What is the Anti-Trade System?The Anti-Trade system is to prevent users that just deposit to withdraw other items without even playing on the site.We call them traders, they want to make profit from such situation. To prevent this we have added a system where you need to place bets worth 3/4 of the amount your withdraw. 3/4 = 0.75How it work:Roulette: amount of your bet = wagerCrash: profit of your win bet = wagerDice: profit of your win bet = wager

As in the FAQ, the rules for withdrawal are clearly conveyed.If I've 12$ then I should be able to withdraw if not then the reason should be explained in the website as to how much more wagering is needed for the bonus but it's clearly not mentioned.I tried withdrawing 12$ it's telling me an error, I tried withdrawing 13.06 it's telling me an error, the same with 14.06.Only the withdrawing amount keeps raising after everyone attempt I make to withdraw, idk if it's the bonus issue or an issue with the website.

comments.body: Quote from: worldofcoins on December 17, 2022, 04:50:23 PMQuote from: Spiroll on December 17, 2022, 04:36:28 PMQuote from: worldofcoins on December 17, 2022, 04:32:31 PMQuote from: Spiroll on December 17, 2022, 04:26:52 PMYour withdrawable balance is not enough. You need to play roulette or you need to win in other games.Roulette: amount of your bet = wagerCrash: profit of your win bet = wagerDice: profit of your win bet = wagersnipped~You need to make the rules clear, they're clearly not defined in the game, doesn't matter I've lost 5$ trying to wager in dice, you need to work on a lot of things if you're going to proceed with this website of yours. it's clearly not up to the standard of other dice sites or casinos and unclear rules are annoying as hell.Sorry to hear that. As in the FAQ, the rules for withdrawal are clearly conveyed.If I've 12$ then I should be able to withdraw if not then the reason should be explained in the website as to how much more wagering is needed for the bonus but it's clearly not mentioned.I tried withdrawing 12$ it's telling me an error, I tried withdrawing 13.06 it's telling me an error, the same with 14.06.Only the withdrawing amount keeps raising after everyone attempt I make to withdraw, idk if it's the bonus issue or an issue with the website.There is no issue. Roulette: amount of your bet = wager If you bet $10, Your withdrawable balance will be $10. (No need to win.)Crash: profit of your win bet = wagerIf you bet $1 and you cash out in 2x you will earn $1. Your withdrawable balance will be $1. (Need to win.)Dice: profit of your win bet = wagerIf you bet $1 and you win in 2x you will earn $1. Your withdrawable balance will be $1. (Need to win.)Everything is clear.
